events.message: I recently received my order but the item was not what I expected, and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning a customer service agent to handle the refund request and related queries for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for the refund request so we can proceed quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on your website, and I am very disappointed.
We can initiate a full refund for your order. Please return the product using the prepaid label we will send you shortly.
Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the quick solution and will send the product back today.
We have processed your refund successfully, and the amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and if you need any further assistance.
Since everything appears resolved, we are closing this case now. Feel free to contact us anytime.
